data.title: The Little School
data.meta_description: Thank you for showing interest in The Little School's Duke location, which serves Duke University's employees, staff, and students! If you have questions along the way, feel free to contact us, and we will be happy to help and advise. data.meta_site_name: The Little School - A 5-star full-day preschool and child development center offering a nurturing, exploratory, educational program serving children 3 months to six years.
data.text:
TUITION AMOUNT

Tuition is not prorated; tuition remains the same regardless of any absence, vacation, holiday, or portion of the month unused.

On a rare occasion, the school may shift the ratio in a particular classroom; in this instance, the tuition would be amended.

SIBLING DISCOUNT

We offer a sibling discount of 10% on the lower tuition amount.

PAYMENT

Tuition is due on the first day of the month. All payments will be made through Brightwheel. (Brightwheel is a trusted childcare center software which automates billing, payment, and enrollment forms.)

OPERATING HOURS

We operate from 7:15 am â€“ 6:00 pm.
